home.title: Magic home decor & baby toys
home.description: Hello! My name is Alena! All my life I lived in a huge noisy metropolis, but my soul always dreamed of the sea. And then my family and I decided to move to the small sunny town of Anapa. This city is located on the shores of the Black Sea and it is the best place for creativity!

content.collections: Hello! My name is Alena! All my life I lived in a huge noisy metropolis, but my soul always dreamed of the sea. And then my family and I decided to move to the small sunny town of Anapa. This city is located on the shores of the Black Sea and it is the best place for creativity!

collections.title: Our collection
collections.description: I love to create home decor and baby toys. Here you can find some of our collections
